name: Birds Birds Birds (cugz kani)
description:
Peck and fling yourself to reach your birdhouse in each level.

Attempted to make a game in less than a month.
Inspired by Super Mario Odyssey's Pokio and like100bears 2d sprite stacking.

Controls:
KB+M:
Left mouse button down - Peck
Mouse move - Move fling direction and power
Left mouse button up - Fling
Right mouse button - Cancel peck

R - Restart level
P / Enter / Space / ESC - Pause
[ While paused: ] Q - Quit
[ While paused: ] V - Toggle screen shake

Arrow keys / WASD - Move level
Space/Enter - Select level
[ While selection key down: ] Esc / Ctrl - Cancel level selection

Gamepad:
A / Right shoulder button down - Peck
Left stick / Right stick - Move fling direction and power
A / Right shoulder button up - Fling
B / X / Left shoulder button - Cancel peck

Y - Restart level
Start - Pause
[ While paused: ] Select - Quit
[ While paused: ] Left stick press - Toggle screen shake

DPad / Left stick / Right stick - Move level
A / Right shoulder button - Select level
[ While selection key down: ] B / X / Left shoulder button - Cancel level selection

Awesome font by Eeve Somepx @somepx
Background set by kvsr on itch.io
Music made in beepbox
sfx made in bfxr

Known issues: 
- Browsers don't allow mouse repositioning. Playing in full screen can help if you find yourself moving the mouse outside of the play area when flinging.
- Some of the buttons wires sprites don't show up when activated. No clue why.
- Pause menu text appears on top of the scene transitions bars. Just once though. Sorting Layers are set properly, no clue why it happens just the once.
